main event: A white object, traveling with the sun, disappeared into the sun over Columbus, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was aluminum-colored and appeared to be traveling with the sun.
The witness observed the object for about 5 minutes and then it disappeared into the sun.
The witness was unsure if the object was a balloon or some other type of aircraft.
The sighting occurred on a bright, clear day with some scattered clouds.
The witness could not determine the exact distance or speed of the object.
photographs: yes, the report includes a sketch of the object
